column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Price for this blowout? About $250 and worth every penny. I never spend that kind of dough but in this case
column2: no regrets. We didn't get dessert or coffee because we were literally too stuffed. We told our waiter it was one of the best meals we'd had. (By coincidence
column3: he went to school in Boston so we chatted about that). Anyway - GO!
